descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Course Description & Learning Objectives
This course introduces students to foundational production and post-production concepts
and techniques. Through lectures, project assignments, in-class exercises and screenings,
critique sessions, and accompanying technical labs, students will gain a good understanding
of the basic steps involved in filmmaking. This is a supportive environment where students
are encouraged to take risks and experiment as they discover their voice as visual
storytellers. Students will have opportunities to work both individually and collaboratively.

Evaluation Method:
? Complete three required projects
? Quizzes and small written assignments
? Complete assigned readings
? Participate fully in in classes and labs

Class Materials:
? Text TBD (~$40)
? $50 refundable deposit required to access equipment "cage"
? External USB 3.0 Harddrive ($70 - $140)
-
